Package org.jboss.windup.bootstrap.commands

Interface FurnaceDependent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAddonCommand, AbstractListCommand, AddAddonDirectoryCommand, AddImmutableAddonDirectoryCommand, DiscoverPackagesCommand, GenerateCompletionDataCommand, GenerateHelpCacheCommand, InstallAddonCommand, ListAddonsCommand, ListSourceTechnologiesCommand, ListTagsCommand, ListTargetTechnologiesCommand, RemoveAddonCommand, RunWindupCommand, UpdateRulesetsCommand
    public interface FurnaceDependent
    An object that must first be provided a running Furnace instance before it may be used.
